summary: Extended /todo command to update ROAD_MAP.md checkboxes when archiving tasks. Added Step 3.5 for roadmap scanning, Step 5.5 for annotation edits, updated dry-run output and final report sections, and documented the roadmap update behavior in Notes. Completed tasks mark items [x] with completion annotation; abandoned tasks keep [ ] with abandonment note.

artifacts.summary: Modified todo command with roadmap update capability (Steps 3.5, 5.5, updated dry-run, output, and notes)
